00147 int nfs_Create( nfs_arg_t         * parg,    
00148                 exportlist_t      * pexport, 
00149                 fsal_op_context_t       * pcontext,   
00150                 cache_inode_client_t    * pclient,
00151                 hash_table_t      * ht,
00152                 struct svc_req    * preq,    
00153                 nfs_res_t         * pres )
00154 {
00155   static char     funcName[] = "nfs_Create";
00156     
00157 
00158   char                  * str_file_name = NULL ;
00159   fsal_name_t             file_name            ;
00160   fsal_accessmode_t       mode                 ;
00161   cache_entry_t         * file_pentry   = NULL ;
00162   cache_entry_t         * parent_pentry = NULL ;
00163   int                     rc                   ;
00164   fsal_attrib_list_t      parent_attr          ;
00165   fsal_attrib_list_t      attr                 ;
00166   fsal_attrib_list_t      attr_newfile         ;
00167   fsal_attrib_list_t      attr_parent_after    ;
00168   fsal_attrib_list_t      attributes_create    ;
00169   fsal_attrib_list_t    * ppre_attr            ;
00170   cache_inode_status_t    cache_status         ;
00171   cache_inode_status_t    cache_status_lookup  ;
00172   cache_inode_file_type_t parent_filetype      ;
00173   fsal_handle_t         * pfsal_handle         ;
00174   
00175         if (preq->rq_vers == NFS_V3)
00176     {
00177       /* to avoid setting it on each error case */
00178       pres->res_create3.CREATE3res_u.resfail.dir_wcc.before.attributes_follow = FALSE;
00179       pres->res_create3.CREATE3res_u.resfail.dir_wcc.after.attributes_follow = FALSE;
00180       ppre_attr = NULL;
00181     }
00182   
00183   if( ( parent_pentry = nfs_FhandleToCache( preq->rq_vers, 
00184                                             &(parg->arg_create2.where.dir),
00185                                             &(parg->arg_create3.where.dir),
00186                                             NULL, 
00187                                             &(pres->res_dirop2.status),
00188                                             &(pres->res_create3.status ),
00189                                             NULL,
00190                                             &parent_attr, 
00191                                             pcontext, 
00192                                             pclient, 
00193                                             ht, 
00194                                             &rc ) ) == NULL )
00195     {
00196       /* Stale NFS FH ? */
00197       return rc ;
00198     }
00199   
00200         /* get directory attributes before action (for V3 reply) */
00201   ppre_attr = &parent_attr;
00202   
00203   /* Extract the filetype */
00204   parent_filetype = cache_inode_fsal_type_convert( parent_attr.type ) ;
00205   
00206         /*
00207          * Sanity checks: new file name must be non-null; parent must be a
00208          * directory. 
00209          */
00210   if( ( parent_filetype != DIR_BEGINNING ) &&  ( parent_filetype != DIR_CONTINUE ) )
00211     {
00212       switch (preq->rq_vers)
00213         {
00214         case NFS_V2:
00215           pres->res_dirop2.status = NFSERR_NOTDIR;
00216           break;
00217           
00218         case NFS_V3:
00219           pres->res_create3.status = NFS3ERR_NOTDIR;
00220           break;
00221         }
00222 
00223       
00224       return NFS_REQ_OK ;
00225         }
00226   
00227         switch( preq->rq_vers )
00228         {
00229         case NFS_V2:
00230            str_file_name = parg->arg_create2.where.name;
00231 
00232            if ( parg->arg_create2.attributes.mode != (unsigned int) -1 )             
00233             {
00234                  mode = unix2fsal_mode( parg->arg_create2.attributes.mode ) ;
00235             }      
00236            else
00237             {
00238                    mode = 0;
00239            }
00240       
00241       break;
00242       
00243     case NFS_V3:
00244       str_file_name = parg->arg_create3.where.name;
00245       if (parg->arg_create3.how.mode == EXCLUSIVE)
00246         {
00247           /*
00248            * Client has not provided mode information.
00249            * If the create works, the client will issue
00250            * a separate setattr request to fix up the
00251            * file's mode, so pick arbitrary value for now.
00252            */
00253           
00254           mode = 0;
00255         }
00256       else if (parg->arg_create3.how.createhow3_u.obj_attributes.mode.set_it == TRUE)
00257         mode =  unix2fsal_mode( parg->arg_create3.how.createhow3_u.obj_attributes.mode.set_mode3_u.mode ) ;
00258       else
00259         mode = 0;
00260       break;
00261     }
00262   
00263       if( str_file_name == NULL || strlen( str_file_name) == 0)
00264         {
00265            if( preq->rq_vers == NFS_V2 ) pres->res_dirop2.status  = NFSERR_IO ;
00266            if( preq->rq_vers == NFS_V3 ) pres->res_create3.status = NFS3ERR_INVAL ;
00267         } 
00268       else
00269         {
00270           if( ( cache_status = cache_inode_error_convert( FSAL_str2name( str_file_name, 
00271                                                                          FSAL_MAX_NAME_LEN,
00272                                                                          &file_name ) ) ) == CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS )
00273             {
00274               /*
00275                * Lookup file to see if it exists.  If so, use it.  Otherwise
00276                * create a new one.
00277                */
00278               file_pentry  = cache_inode_lookup( parent_pentry, 
00279                                                  &file_name, 
00280                                                  &attr, 
00281                                                  ht, 
00282                                                  pclient, 
00283                                                  pcontext, 
00284                                                  &cache_status_lookup ) ;
00285         
00286               if( ( cache_status_lookup == CACHE_INODE_NOT_FOUND ) ||
00287                   ( ( cache_status_lookup == CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS ) && (parg->arg_create3.how.mode == UNCHECKED) ) )
00288 
00289                 {
00290                   /* Create the file */
00291                   if( ( parg->arg_create3.how.mode == UNCHECKED ) && ( cache_status_lookup == CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS ) )
00292                     {
00293                       cache_status = CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS ;
00294                       attr_newfile = attr ;
00295                     }
00296                   else
00297                       file_pentry = cache_inode_create( parent_pentry, 
00298                                                         &file_name, 
00299                                                         REGULAR_FILE, 
00300                                                         mode,
00301                                                         NULL,
00302                                                         &attr_newfile, 
00303                                                         ht, 
00304                                                         pclient, 
00305                                                         pcontext, 
00306                                                         &cache_status ) ;
00307 
00308                   if( file_pentry != NULL ) 
00309                     {
00310                       /*
00311                        * Look at sattr to see if some attributes are to be set at creation time 
00312                        */ 
00313                       attributes_create.asked_attributes = 0ULL ;
00314                 
00315                       switch (preq->rq_vers)
00316                       {
00317                       case NFS_V2:
00318                   
00319                         if( nfs2_Sattr_To_FSALattr( &attributes_create, 
00320                                                     &parg->arg_create2.attributes ) == 0 )
00321                         {
00322                           pres->res_dirop2.status = NFSERR_IO ;
00323                           return NFS_REQ_OK ;
00324                           break;
00325                         }                  
00326                         break;
00327 
00328                       case NFS_V3:
00329                   
00330                         if( nfs3_Sattr_To_FSALattr( &attributes_create, 
00331                                                     &parg->arg_create3.how.createhow3_u.obj_attributes ) == 0 )
00332                         {
00333                           pres->res_create3.status = NFS3ERR_INVAL ;                             
00334                           return NFS_REQ_OK ;
00335                         }
00336                         break;
00337                       }
00338 
00339                       /* Mode is managed above (in cache_inode_create), there is no need 
00340                        * to manage it */
00341                       if( attributes_create.asked_attributes & FSAL_ATTR_MODE )
00342                         attributes_create.asked_attributes &= ~FSAL_ATTR_MODE ;
00343 
00344                       /* Some clients (like Solaris 10) try to set the size of the file to 0
00345                        * at creation time. The FSAL create empty file, so we ignore this */
00346                       if( attributes_create.asked_attributes & FSAL_ATTR_SIZE )
00347                         attributes_create.asked_attributes &= ~FSAL_ATTR_SIZE ;
00348 
00349                       if( attributes_create.asked_attributes & FSAL_ATTR_SPACEUSED )
00350                         attributes_create.asked_attributes &= ~FSAL_ATTR_SPACEUSED ;
00351                  
00352                       /* Are there attributes to be set (additional to the mode) ? */
00353                       if( attributes_create.asked_attributes != 0ULL &&
00354                           attributes_create.asked_attributes != FSAL_ATTR_MODE )
00355                         {
00356                           /* A call to cache_inode_setattr is required */
00357                           if( cache_inode_setattr( file_pentry, 
00358                                                    &attributes_create, 
00359                                                    ht,
00360                                                    pclient, 
00361                                                    pcontext, 
00362                                                    &cache_status ) != CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS )
00363                             {
00364                               /* If we are here, there was an error */
00365                               nfs_SetFailedStatus( pcontext, pexport,
00366                                                    preq->rq_vers, 
00367                                                    cache_status,
00368                                                    &pres->res_dirop2.status,
00369                                                    &pres->res_create3.status,
00370                                                    NULL, NULL,
00371                                                    parent_pentry,
00372                                                    ppre_attr,
00373                                                    &(pres->res_create3.CREATE3res_u.resfail.dir_wcc),
00374                                                    NULL, NULL, NULL);
00375                         
00376                               if( nfs_RetryableError( cache_status ) )
00377                                 return NFS_REQ_DROP ;
00378                         
00379                               return NFS_REQ_OK ;
00380                             }
00381 
00382                           /* Get the resulting attributes from the Cache Inode */
00383                           if( cache_inode_getattr( file_pentry, 
00384                                                    &attr_newfile,
00385                                                    ht, 
00386                                                    pclient, 
00387                                                    pcontext, 
00388                                                    &cache_status ) != CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS )
00389                             {
00390                                 /* If we are here, there was an error */
00391                        
00392                               nfs_SetFailedStatus( pcontext, pexport,
00393                                                    preq->rq_vers, 
00394                                                    cache_status,
00395                                                    &pres->res_dirop2.status,
00396                                                    &pres->res_create3.status,
00397                                                    NULL, NULL,
00398                                                    parent_pentry,
00399                                                    ppre_attr,
00400                                                    &(pres->res_create3.CREATE3res_u.resfail.dir_wcc),
00401                                                    NULL, NULL, NULL);
00402                         
00403                               if( nfs_RetryableError( cache_status) )
00404                                 return NFS_REQ_DROP ;
00405                         
00406                               return NFS_REQ_OK ;
00407                             }
00408                     
00409                         }
00410 
00411                       /*
00412                        * Get the FSAL handle for this entry 
00413                        */
00414                       pfsal_handle =  cache_inode_get_fsal_handle( file_pentry, 
00415                                                                    &cache_status ) ;
00416                       if( cache_status == CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS )
00417                         {
00418                           
00419                           switch( preq->rq_vers )
00420                             {
00421                             case NFS_V2:
00422                               /* Build file handle */
00423                               if( nfs2_FSALToFhandle( &(pres->res_dirop2.DIROP2res_u.diropok.file), pfsal_handle, pexport ) == 0 )
00424                                 pres->res_dirop2.status = NFSERR_IO;
00425                               else
00426                                 {
00427                                   if( !nfs2_FSALattr_To_Fattr( pexport, &attr_newfile,
00428                                                                &(pres->res_dirop2.DIROP2res_u.diropok.attributes) ) )
00429                                     pres->res_dirop2.status = NFSERR_IO;
00430                                   else
00431                                     pres->res_dirop2.status = NFS_OK ;
00432                                 }
00433                         
00434                               break;
00435                               
00436                             case NFS_V3:
00437 #ifdef _DEBUG_MEMLEAKS
00438                               /* For debugging memory leaks */
00439                               BuddySetDebugLabel( "Filehandle V3 in nfs3_Create" ) ;
00440 #endif 
00441                               /* Build file handle */
00442                               if( ( pres->res_create3.CREATE3res_u.resok.obj. post_op_fh3_u.handle.data.data_val = Mem_Alloc( NFS3_FHSIZE ) ) == NULL )
00443                                 {
00444                                   pres->res_create3.status  = NFS3ERR_IO ; 
00445                                   return NFS_REQ_OK ;
00446                                 }
00447 #ifdef _DEBUG_MEMLEAKS
00448                               /* For debugging memory leaks */
00449                               BuddySetDebugLabel( "N/A" ) ;
00450 #endif   
00451                               /* Set Post Op Fh3 structure */
00452                               if( nfs3_FSALToFhandle( &pres->res_create3.CREATE3res_u.resok.obj.post_op_fh3_u.handle,
00453                                                       pfsal_handle,
00454                                                       pexport ) == 0  )
00455                                 {
00456                                   Mem_Free( (char *)pres->res_create3.CREATE3res_u.resok.obj.post_op_fh3_u.handle.data.data_val ) ;
00457                             
00458                                   pres->res_create3.status = NFS3ERR_BADHANDLE ;
00459                                   return NFS_REQ_OK ;
00460                                 }
00461                           
00462                           
00463                               /* Set Post Op Fh3 structure */
00464                               pres->res_create3.CREATE3res_u.resok.obj.handle_follows = TRUE ;
00465                               pres->res_create3.CREATE3res_u.resok.obj.post_op_fh3_u.handle.data.data_len  =  sizeof( file_handle_v3_t ) ;
00466 
00467                               /* Get the attributes of the parent after the operation */
00468                               cache_inode_get_attributes( parent_pentry, &attr_parent_after ) ;
00469                                                     
00470                               /* Build entry attributes */
00471                               nfs_SetPostOpAttr( pcontext, pexport, 
00472                                                  file_pentry, 
00473                                                  &attr_newfile,
00474                                                  &(pres->res_create3.CREATE3res_u.resok.obj_attributes));
00475                         
00476                               /*
00477                                * Build Weak Cache Coherency
00478                                * data 
00479                                */
00480                               nfs_SetWccData( pcontext, pexport,
00481                                               parent_pentry, 
00482                                               ppre_attr, 
00483                                               &attr_parent_after,
00484                                               &(pres->res_create3.CREATE3res_u.resok.dir_wcc));
00485                         
00486                               pres->res_create3.status = NFS3_OK;
00487                               break;
00488                             } /* switch */
00489                           return NFS_REQ_OK ;
00490                         }
00491                     }
00492                 }
00493               else
00494                 {
00495                   if( cache_status_lookup == CACHE_INODE_SUCCESS )
00496                     {
00497                       /* Trying to create a file that already exists */
00498                       cache_status = CACHE_INODE_ENTRY_EXISTS ;
00499 
00500                       switch (preq->rq_vers)
00501                         {
00502                         case NFS_V2:
00503                           pres->res_dirop2.status = NFSERR_EXIST ;
00504                           break;
00505                     
00506                         case NFS_V3:
00507                           pres->res_create3.status = NFS3ERR_EXIST ;
00508                           break;
00509                         }
00510                     }
00511                   else
00512                     {
00513                       /* Server fault */
00514                       cache_status = cache_status_lookup ;
00515 
00516                       switch (preq->rq_vers)
00517                         {
00518                         case NFS_V2:
00519                           pres->res_dirop2.status = NFSERR_IO ;
00520                           break;
00521                     
00522                         case NFS_V3:
00523                           pres->res_create3.status = NFS3ERR_INVAL ;
00524                           break;
00525                         }
00526                     }
00527       
00528                    nfs_SetFailedStatus( pcontext, pexport, 
00529                                         preq->rq_vers, 
00530                                         cache_status,
00531                                         &pres->res_dirop2.status,
00532                                         &pres->res_create3.status,
00533                                         NULL, NULL,
00534                                         parent_pentry,
00535                                         ppre_attr,
00536                                         &(pres->res_create3.CREATE3res_u.resfail.dir_wcc),
00537                                         NULL, NULL, NULL);
00538              
00539                    return NFS_REQ_OK ;
00540                 } /* if( cache_status_lookup == CACHE_INODE_NOT_FOUND ) */
00541             }
00542           }
00543   
00544         /* Set the exit status */
00545         nfs_SetFailedStatus( pcontext, pexport,
00546                              preq->rq_vers, 
00547                              cache_status,
00548                              &pres->res_dirop2.status,
00549                              &pres->res_create3.status,
00550                              NULL, NULL,
00551                              parent_pentry,
00552                              ppre_attr,
00553                              &(pres->res_create3.CREATE3res_u.resfail.dir_wcc),
00554                              NULL, NULL, NULL);
00555   
00556          /* If we are here, there was an error */
00557         if( nfs_RetryableError( cache_status) )
00558         {
00559                 return NFS_REQ_DROP ;
00560         }
00561 
00562         return NFS_REQ_OK ;
00563 } /* nfs_Create */
00564 
00573 void nfs_Create_Free( nfs_res_t * resp )
00574 {
00575   if ((resp->res_create3.status == NFS3_OK) &&
00576       (resp->res_create3.CREATE3res_u.resok.obj.handle_follows == TRUE))
00577     Mem_Free(resp->res_create3.CREATE3res_u.resok.obj.post_op_fh3_u.handle.data.data_val);
00578 }
Generated on Wed Apr 9 08:24:29 2008 for NFS and Mount protocols layer by  1.3.9.1
